title: Amazon now delivers your packages to a Washington DC police station because they'll get stolen off your porch
description: If you are reading this, you may be among one of the 49 million Americans who had a package stolen off your porch. Crime has gotten so out of hand, Amazon made the decision that it's easier just to send the packages to the local police station for you to pick up. They launched their new program this week. title: Here it comes: Jason Aldean gets canceled by PR firm after his wife makes gender joke on Instagram
description:
You had to know it was going to happen. Jason Aldean's long-time PR firm GreenRoom PR has dropped Aldean as a client. This comes after controversy over his wife Brittney Aldean making a joke about gender and being a tomboy on Instagram. Critics say that the joke was "transphobic."
